channel.title: Death animations
channel.description:
Hi, I'm loving black mesa thanks so much for making it. :smiley:
After seeing Icky nom that scientist in Apprehension I couldn't help but wonder about death scenes. This would mean that if Gordon is on low enough health, say to get killed with the next attack from the enemy, that a special death animation would play instead of Gordon just dieing. For example with a Headcrab it could be that when the player is on low health the Headcrab will jump at Gordon and latch onto his head & with Gargantua it could be that Garg lifts up Gordon and bites of his head, Sven co-op style. I really think that implementing something like this would enhance the game-play heaps as just falling to the floor can get a little boring.
What do the rest of you think about this?
